resources.string: Would you like to cancel the current VPN Connection?

A VPN is the best way to conceal your activity online. When you use a VPN, your data connection is encrypted, so ISPs, governments, NSA spies, and other third parties cannot see which websites you visit, what you download, or whether you use services such as Whatsapp. Snake VPN protects your privacy and prevents others from monitoring and controlling your online communications and browsing activity. With Snake VPN, your location stays private and you can also switch between multiple VPN server locations.
Where can I find the Snake VPN server list?

The list of Snake VPN server locations and the protocols/services supported in each country is available at server page. On the Servers page, you will also find extra information about the different server types.
How can I reach Snake VPN customer support?
You can get support over telegram with our telegram number +2348179199863 we will answer your questions and solve your issues quickly and efficiently. Feel free to contact us anytime
What protocol does Snake VPN use?

We use OpenVPN protocol. OpenVPN is a piece of open-source software that enables us to provide a reliable and secure VPN service. It is a protocol that can be used on both TCP and UDP ports. OpenVPN supports a great number of strong encryption algorithms and ciphers: to ensure the protection of your data, we use AES-256-GCM with a 4096-bit DH key. We recommend it for the most security-conscious users.
How can I check if I have connected successfully?
After you select server and click conneect button, if the connection is successful it will show notification on your status bar that you have connected to the VPN.
How to purchase a Snake VPN subscription?
To purchase a Snake VPN subscription, click bottom button on main page. Then select subscription type monthly, 3 month, 6 month, or yearly.

Snake VPN takes basic VPN services to the next level with extra layers of functionality, additional web security services, and outstanding usability. Among our many features, you can find a huge network of servers optimized for specific purposes, an automatic kill switch in case of connection interruptions, a double encryption option, and a DNS leak resolver.
Your apps is not the latest version for better experience please update the app.
Connect through any of our server and remove ads, stay secure and anonymous with Snake VPN
